name: Cotton Pickin Cake
author: Iva Welter

ingredients.name: box Duncan Hines cake mix (buttery kind)
c. Wesson oil (no other kind) 1 can mandarin oranges-juice and all

instructions: Blend cake mix, eggs, oil and oranges in mixer. Bake in 3 layers at 325Â° or until pick comes out dry. Completely cool.
